reactTabInfo: Check out the new Admin-tab "Homebridge" (needs to be activated manually) for a more convenient way to install Homebridge plugins and configure them (Beta).
selectOptionGlobal: Global Mode (start an existing compatible Homebridge service installed globally on your system)
selectOptionLocal: Local Mode (install a local Homebridge in ioBroker as a bridge)
selectOptionWrapper: Wrapper Mode (just run Homebridge plugins in ioBroker, no bridge advertised)
updateLibraries: Update Homebridge plugins from NPM on next start
Name: Name
global_mode_note: This instance is configured in global mode. The installation of modules and configuration is managed outside of ioBroker and thus nothing can be configured here.
Do you really want to remove %s: Do you really want to remove %s?
select_config_note_%s: We couldn't figure out which configuration section belongs to %s. Please choose the type and name of the configuration:
